page.title: 18Old People - Paignton
page.content: {Kings Ash Hospital}and {Primley House} are two buildings in the area that cater for the old. {Kings Ash Hospital}has 21 beds in two wards, one for men and the other for women. This is a pure hospital, in other words the patients leave once they are well enough. {Primley House} on the other hand looks after old folk as long as they wish. The Home is owned by Primley Housing Association a non profit making society with charitable status. There is a spacious Dining room, a library, pleasant secluded grounds. Bedrooms are mostly shared. There is always a responsible person on duty both day and night. The lady in charge is called the Matron.
